status.description: HTTP Status code of the request

assignedTo.description: Unique identifier of the team member assigned to this conversation

contactId.description: Unique identifier of the contact associated with this conversation

dateAdded.description: Date when the conversation was created

dateUpdated.description: Date when the conversation was last updated

deleted.description: Flag indicating if this conversation has been deleted

lastMessageDate.description: Date of the last message in the conversation

locationId.description: Unique identifier of the business location where this conversation takes place

lastMessageBody.example: Hello, this is the message body

lastMessageType.description: Type of the last message sent/received in the conversation.

unreadCount.description: Count of unread messages in the conversation

contactName.description: Alternative display name for the contact - used when full name is not available

email.description: Primary email address of the contact

fullName.description: Complete name of the contact (first and last name)

lastMessageBody.description: Content of the most recent message in the conversation
lastMessageBody.example: This is a sample message body

lastMessageType.description: Channel/type of the most recent message (SMS, Email, Call, etc)

phone.description: Primary phone number of the contact

type.description: Primary channel/type of the conversation (Phone, Email, etc)

unreadCount.description: Number of unread messages in this conversation

conversation.description: Conversation data of the provided conversation ID.

success.description: Indicates whether the API request was successful.
Boolean value as the API response.

message.example: There was an error from the provider

assignedTo.description: Unique identifier of the team member currently responsible for handling this conversation

contactId.description: Unique identifier of the contact associated with this conversation

deleted.description: Flag indicating if this conversation has been moved to trash/deleted

id.description: Unique identifier for this specific conversation thread

inbox.description: Flag indicating if this conversation is currently in the main inbox view

locationId.description: Unique identifier of the business location where this conversation takes place

starred.description: Flag indicating if this conversation has been marked as important/starred by the user

type.description: Communication channel type for this conversation: 1 (Phone), 2 (Email), 3 (Facebook Messenger), 4 (Review), 5 (Group SMS), 6 (Internal Chat - coming soon)

unreadCount.description: Number of messages in this conversation that have not been read by the user

conversation.description: Conversation data of the provided conversation ID.

success.description: Boolean value as the API response.

bcc.description: List of email Ids of the people in the bcc field

cc.description: List of email Ids of the people in the cc field

from.description: Name and Email Id of the sender

replyToMessageId.description: In case of reply, email message Id of the reply to email

to.description: List of email Ids of the receivers

attachments.description: An array of attachment URLs. Attachments will be empty for Call and Voicemails, type 1 and 10. Please use get call recording API to fetch call recording and voicemails.

messageType.description: Type of the message as a string

endTime.description: End time of the sentence in milliseconds

mediaChannel.description: Media channel describes the user interaction channel

sentenceIndex.description: Index of the sentence in the transcription

startTime.description: Start time of the sentence in milliseconds

transcript.example: This call may be recorded for quality assurance purposes.

lastMessageId.description: Id of the last message in the messages array

nextPage.description: Next page value true indicates only 20 message is in the response. Rest of the messages are in the next page. Please use the lastMessageId value in the query to get the next page messages

callStatus.description: Call status - can be pending, completed, answered, busy, no-answer, failed, canceled, or voicemail

email.description: meta will contain email, for message type 3 (email). messageIds is list of all email message ids under the message thread

call.description: Phone call dialer and receiver information

direction.description: Message direction, if required can be set manually, default is outbound

emailBcc.description: List of email address to BCC

emailCc.description: List of email address to CC

emailFrom.description: Email address to send from. This field is associated with the contact record and cannot be dynamically changed.

emailMessageId.description: Send the email message id for which this email should be threaded. This is for replying to a specific email

emailTo.description: Recipient email address. This field is associated with the contact record and cannot be dynamically changed.

messageId.description: This is the main Message ID

call.description: Phone call dialer and receiver information

conversations.description: The list of all conversations found for the given query

total.description: Total Number of results found for the given query

contactId.description: ID of the contact receiving the message

emailTo.description: Email address to send to, if different from contact's primary email. This should be a valid email address associated with the contact.

fromNumber.description: Phone number used as the sender number for outbound messages

message.example: Hello, how can I help you today?

replyMessageId.description: ID of message being replied to

scheduledTimestamp.description: UTC Timestamp (in seconds) at which the message should be scheduled

threadId.description: ID of message thread. For email messages, this is the message ID that contains multiple email messages in the thread

toNumber.description: Recipient phone number for outbound messages

emailMessageId.description: This contains the email message id (only for Email type). Use this ID to send inbound replies to GHL to create a threaded email.

messageId.description: This is the main Message ID

messageIds.description: When sending via the GMB channel, we will be returning list of `messageIds` instead of single `messageId`.

msg.description: Additional response message when sending a workflow message

startAfterDate.description: Search to begin after the specified date - should contain the sort value of the last document
Search to begin after the specified date - should contain the sort value of the last document

message.example: Invalid token: access token is invalid

unreadCount.description: Count of unread messages in the conversation

error.description: Error object from the conversation provider

recipients.description: Email delivery status for additional email recipients.

status.description: HTTP Status code of the request

visitorId.description: visitorId is the Unique ID assigned to each Live chat visitor. visitorId will be added soon in GET Contact API

Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Agency (OR) Private Integration Token of Agency.
Agency-Access.name: Authorization

Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.
Location-Access.name: Authorization

bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.
bearer.name: Authorization

post.description: Creates a new conversation with the data provided

get.description: Get the recording transcription for a message by passing the message id

200.description: Gives the attached recording transcription to the message

get.description: Download the recording transcription for a message by passing the message id

200.description: Downloads the attached transcription of the message

post.description: Post the necessary fields for the API to send a new message.

delete.description: Post the messageId for the API to delete a scheduled email message.

200.description: The scheduled email message was cancelled successfully
Email object for the id given.

post.description: Post the necessary fields for the API to add a new inbound message.
Post the necessary fields for the API to add a new outbound call.

Post the necessary fields for the API to upload files. The files need to be a buffer with the key "fileAttachment".

The allowed file types are:
  • JPG
  • JPEG
  • PNG
  • MP4
  • MPEG
  • ZIP
  • RAR
  • PDF
  • DOC
  • DOCX
  • TXT
  • MP3
  • WAV


The API will return an object with the URLs

200.description: Message object for the id given.

get.description: Get the recording for a message by passing the message id

200.description: Gives the attached recording to the message

delete.description: Post the messageId for the API to delete a scheduled message.

200.description: The scheduled message was cancelled successfully

put.description: Post the necessary fields for the API to update message status.

post.description: Agent/AI-Bot will call this when they are typing a message in live chat message

201.description: Show typing indicator for live chat

post.summary: Agent/Ai-Bot is typing a message indicator for live chat

get.description: Returns a list of all conversations matching the search criteria along with the sort and filter options selected.

parameters.description: User IDs that conversations are assigned to. Multiple IDs can be provided as comma-separated values. Use "unassigned" to fetch conversations not assigned to any user.
parameters.name: assignedTo

parameters.description: User IDs of followers to filter conversations by. Multiple IDs can be provided as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: followers

parameters.description: User Id of the mention. Multiple values are comma separated.
parameters.name: mentions

parameters.description: Search to begin after the specified date - should contain the sort value of the last document
parameters.name: startAfterDate

parameters.description: Type of the last message in the conversation as a string
parameters.name: lastMessageType

parameters.description: Action of the last outbound message in the conversation as string.
parameters.name: lastMessageAction

parameters.description: Direction of the last message in the conversation as string.
parameters.name: lastMessageDirection

parameters.description: The status of the conversation to be filtered - all, read, unread, starred
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: The sorting of the conversation to be filtered as - manual messages or all messages
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: Id of score profile on which sortBy.ScoreProfile should sort on
parameters.name: sortScoreProfile

parameters.description: Id of score profile on which conversations should get filtered out, works with scoreProfileMin & scoreProfileMax
parameters.name: scoreProfile

delete.description: Delete the conversation details based on the conversation ID

get.description: Get the conversation details based on the conversation ID

put.description: Update the conversation details based on the conversation ID

parameters.description: Message ID of the last message in the list as a string
parameters.name: lastMessageId

parameters.description: Number of messages to be fetched from the conversation. Default limit is 20
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Types of message to fetched separated with comma
parameters.name: type

200.description: List of messages for the conversation id of the given type.
